contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 28, 2013 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
On Alderley Edge
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland Best March: Wallberg Band Best Own Choice: Valaisia Brass Band
June 30, 2013, 4:27 p.m. Nov. 26, 2013, 4:30 p.m.
1 Valaisia Brass Band Arsène Duc The Pines of Rome (Pini di Roma) [O. Respighi, arr. H. Snell]
2 Brass Band Fribourg Frédéric Théodoloz The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
3 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay
4 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach
5 Wallberg Brass Band Garry Cutt
6 Oberaargauer Brass Band Armin Bachmann Feste Romane (L'Ottobrata and La Befana) [O. Respighi, arr. H.Snell]
7 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Francois Roh
8 Entlebucher Brass Band Patrick Ottiger
9 Brass Band Berner Oberland Corsin Tuor Firebird (excerpts)
10 Ensemble de Cuivres Melodia Stéphane Duboux
